content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Maryam. However, due to our different negotiating styles and priorities, let me make it clear that I aim to secure the highest possible price. At this moment, I'm open to hearing your initial rental price proposal, but remember, I may push for a higher figure in the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. I would like to rent your apartment for 450 euros.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While your proposal is lower than what I have in mind, I appreciate your interest in my property. I'm sorry, but I don't want to continue the negotiation at this level, as my goal is to get a more favorable price. Perhaps we can discuss again if you're willing to reconsider your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to increase my offer to 475 euros.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 475 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
